metadata.name: Quest for youth
metadata.description:
The artwork's story revolves around a person's journey who is on his quest to discover the divine hidden Gateway of Youth.
The stories about this gateway are defined in the holy scriptures, where it was written that whoever crosses this gateway will be eternally young.

In this artwork, we see a man standing in front of the gate for which he has spent his entire life searching for.
When he arrived at the divine location, he was astounded to see how an abandoned gate lit up and got completely covered in flora. It was magnificent and the light was so bright that he couldn't open his eyes.
 So he stands there holding his stick in the hope to cross this Gateway of Youth.
